subject: Add another newbie to the mix......
author: azwepa62
full_text:
Thanks for accepting me into your group!

I, too, came across the group via the discussion on the AGS site. And I look forward to learning from the insight this group has to offer. I'm relatively new to this subject, so I hope you don't mind that I absorb a lot of info before I can feel comfortable with the adding my two cents.

Thanks again!!

Bill
